basics.name: Geofrey Cleland
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Management Information Systems at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2022.

work.summary: Control and maintain front of house
highlights: Receive 50+ phone calls daily, with duties include making reservations, phone orders and customer questions
Able to remain calm under pressure and manage multiple people during dinner rush hours

work.summary: Previously: Quality Control, Section Sergeant, Flight Instructor, Crew
highlights: Controlled and maintain records of 30 aircrafts to ensure they were safe for operation
Directly responsible for the welfare of over 40 soldiers which included managing and mentoring

awards.title: Freeman Foundation Study Abroad Scholarship to China
awards.summary: to promote international understanding through support for intensive second language training and international travel with study abroad opportunities to China
